LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.label: The Survivor
LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.description: People called you crazy for leaving your glitterworld home, but you always yearned to explore the stars - outside the neurosimulator. Now you're at the end of your long journey in cryptosleep, landing on an unknown rimworld to see what it's like。
LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.scenario.name: The Survivor
LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.scenario.summary: One rich explorer out to experience the universe。
LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.scenario.description: People called you crazy for leaving your glitterworld home, but you always yearned to explore the stars - outside the neurosimulator. Now you're at the end of your long journey in cryptosleep, landing on an unknown rimworld to see what it's like。
LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.scenario.parts.0.text: The neurosimulations, holo-games, and free-orgies were never enough for you. You wanted more - the grit and consequence of real life, like they talk about in the history books. You wanted to know what real challenge and consequence feel like.\n\nNow, after a journey of decades in cryptosleep, you're landing on this unknown rimworld. Real consequences await you。
